channel.title: CVE Feed for Legion of the Bouncy Castle -- BouncyCastle TLS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Legion of the Bouncy Castle -- BouncyCastle TLS

item.title: CVE-2017-13098|2024-08-05T18:58:12.272Z -- legion%20of%20the%20bouncy%20castle -- bouncycastle%20tls
item.description: BouncyCastle TLS prior to version 1.0.3, when configured to use the JCE (Java Cryptography Extension) for cryptographic functions, provides a weak Bleichenbacher oracle when any TLS cipher suite using RSA key exchange is negotiated. An attacker can recover the private key from a vulnerable application. This vulnerability is referred to as "ROBOT."
